item.title: Quinta Brunson and ‘Abbott Elementary’ Cast Film Season 5 Episode During Phillies Game
item.description: The live-event, single-location shoot for the ABC comedy’s fifth season took place at Citizens Bank Park during a Philadelphia Phillies game on Thursday night.

item.title: ‘Awards Chatter’ Pod: Janelle James on ‘Abbott Elementary,’ Sudden Fame and Deserving an Emmy
item.description: In front of an audience at Chapman University, the stand-up comedian/actress tells THR about her journey to Quinta Brunson’s comedy series, all four seasons of which have brought her Emmy nominations.

item.title: ABC Sets Fall Rollout for ‘High Potential,’ ‘Abbott Elementary’ and More Series
item.description: The network will stretch its premieres over several weeks in September and October.
